attributes.action: Save the English language - proper use of apostrophes.
attributes.additional_details:
DoE to take urgent steps to ban:-
" family's"   "tuition fee,s"   "1p's and 2p's"   "under 18's"    "WHEELCHAIR USER's"  and "M'P's" from internet petitions,
and to ensure that UK citizens receive a decent education so that they have half a chance of using their own language correctly when they post a petition on this site.
